import React from 'react' import '../styles/home.css' import{ Container, Row, Col} from 'reactstrap'; import heroImg01 from '../assets/images/hero-img01.jpg' import heroImg02 from '../assets/images/hero-img02.jpg' import heroImg03 from '../assets/images/hero-img03.jpg' import Subtitle from '../shared/Subtitle'; import SearchBar from '../shared/SearchBar'; import ServiceList from '../services/ServiceList'; import FeaturedNewarrivalList from '../components/Featured-newarrivals/FeaturedNewarrivalList'; import ImagesGallery from '../components/Image-gallery/ImagesGallery'; /* HERO SECTION*/ const Home = () => { return <>

Our expertly curated selection of stylish pieces will transform any space into a welcoming and comfortable haven. Plus, our commitment to sustainability means you can feel good about your purchase.
